name: Deae Tonosama: Appare Ichiban
overview: The Earth is in danger, the Tokugawa shogunate has been overrun by an extra-terrestrial evil force, and only two morons have the power to save the day. Play as either a daft French nobleman or an idiot Japanese lord and crush your foes with style. East meets west in this quirky but entertaining action game that unfolds across the world — and beyond!
